name: Cyber Break
description:
The First Game from Scarlet Cove

Ever since you were wrongfully convicted and thrown in prison you were hoping for a way out, now that a riot has broken out you finally have your chance. Will you succeed in Cyber Break?

Credits:
Weegol, Maldark909, WolfFireSword, Res, and Mister Kad.

This game was made for Reload Magazine's first game jam using the Easy FPS Editor game engine please check out Reload Magazine, their game jam as well, and the Easy FPS game engine.

https://itch.io/jam/reload-magazine-game-jam-1/entries

https://jessicochan.itch.io/easy-fps-editor-lite

Mister Kad's music was used with his full permission, please support Mister Kad at his bandcamp.
https://misterkad.bandcamp.com/
